MedWeave

Weaving the World into a Web

Your Data Decentralised, Secure, Permanent.

Security Breaches cost healthcare companies $6 trillion Dollars

75.6% chance of breach of at least 5 million records in the next year.

In 60% of cases attackers were able to compromised centralised databases in minutes.

98.4% of links are broken after 20 years leading to a loss of digital data.

Introducing MedWeave

Every year healthcare providers experience numerous attacks on their databases, leading to the breach of valuable and confidential records. This is often costly to both patients and healtcare providers.

MedWeave aims to solve this issue by incorportaing blockchain technologies to create a safe, secure and permanent database.

The decentralised nature of blockchain ensures that data stored is safe and permanant. Arweave enables us to store these valuable and confidential data permanetly.
